title: Convert to shares and assets take into consideration the fees
content:
## Severity: Low Risk

## Context
VaultV2.sol#L636-L644

## Description
When converting shares to assets and vice versa using `convertToShares` and `convertToAssets`, the corresponding preview functions call `accrueInterestView()`. Finally, the performance and management fee shares are used when deriving the final value. According to EIP-4626, these conversion endpoints **MUST NOT** be inclusive of any fees that are charged against assets in the Vault.

## Recommendation
Either ensure that the `convertToShares` and `convertToAssets` functions do not take into consideration the fees, or perhaps add a `@dev` NatSpec comment to highlight this.

## Morpho
Fixed in PR 724.

## Spearbit
NatSpec comments have been added.
